data.title: Capacity Building Partners
data.meta_description: See how we support building organizational infrastructure and culture so that leaders and organizations are able to navigate change and drive lasting social change.
data.text:
“Thank you for putting together all these valuable offerings. You do a beautiful job of reacting to the needs of all the grantees!”

Ricky Safer

CEO, PSC Partners Seeking A Cure

“This training was incredibly helpful and is one of the best webinars so far. A big shout out to Nicole Sanchez for framing the training around empathy, compassion, and equity.”

Estephanie Sunga

Senior Program & Events Manager,

Non-Profit Housing Association of Northern California

“Thank you! My staff is loving the trainings that CZI is hosting and recommending. It is lifting morale and helping our team find new and improved ways to work.”

Evelyn Stivers

Executive Director,

Housing Leadership Council of San Mateo

“I'm really appreciating these trainings! Of the three I've attended so far, all have been high quality and I've been able to instantly put to use all I've learned.”

Ann Cheng

TransForm/Former Program Director

“The Capacity Building Program is an essential, community-responsive resource for non-profits of many sizes/locations/missions to skill up; rest more; center belonging; and do the work more effectively but with ease.”

Aileen Joy (AJ)

Director of Resource Organizing and Organizational Development, Tenants Together

“CZI's capacity building resources are such a valuable support to nonprofits! I have learned and been reminded of many best practices and new tools to implement at our organization. The broad and deep expertise of the capacity building trainers and the ability to access past sessions and connect in follow-up with the trainers takes our system and business operations to the next level.” Keesha Ceran Associate Director, Teaching for Change”

Keesha Ceran

Associate Director, Teaching for Change
